title: Shaaz Ahmedüêº
subtitle: Panda Enthusiast. writer. friend.
writtenText:
You are art.
And art is everything.
heyThereBody:
My name is Shaaz. Doctor by profession, writer by passion.
(I also support Arsenal Football Club to maximise suffering).
I write. To express myself. To share the happy feelings inside. To let go of things I carried for too long, perhaps helping others relieve some of their burdens too. To balance out my abundant talents, god blessed me with an ankle capable of spraining itself.
instagramTitle: I also write on instagram. Read maybe?

testimonials.name: Akhilesh
testimonials.body:
Happy birthday Bru.
May the sun never set on your ride that is life, and if it does, do not go gentle into that good night.
